trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of nodes that can be accessed by name or index.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de nós que podem ser acedidos por nome ou o índice.

trans-unit.source: `XmlNamedNodeMap` is returned by the following three properties.
trans-unit.target: `XmlNamedNodeMap`é devolvido pelas três propriedades seguintes.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.Attributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - Returns <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection>, a class which inherits from `XmlNamedNodeMap`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.Attributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-Devolve <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection>, uma classe que herda de `XmlNamedNodeMap`.</xref:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.Attributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Entities%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - Returns an `XmlNamedNodeMap` containing <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntity> objects.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Entities%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-Devolve um `XmlNamedNodeMap` contendo <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntity>objetos.</xref:System.Xml.XmlEntity> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Entities%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The `XmlNamedNodeMap` is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O `XmlNamedNodeMap` é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Notations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - Returns an `XmlNamedNodeMap` containing <xref:System.Xml.XmlNotation> objects.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Notations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-Devolve um `XmlNamedNodeMap` contendo <xref:System.Xml.XmlNotation>objetos.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNotation> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Notations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The `XmlNamedNodeMap` is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O `XmlNamedNodeMap` é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of nodes in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de nós no <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of nodes.
trans-unit.target: O número de nós.

trans-unit.source: Provides support for the "foreach" style iteration over the collection of nodes in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte para iteração de estilo "foreach" sobre a recolha de nós no <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de enumerador.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> specified by name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> especificado pelo nome.

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the node to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O nome qualificado do nó obter.

trans-unit.source: It is matched against the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name*> property of the matching node.
trans-unit.target: Este é comparado com o <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name*>propriedade do nó correspondente.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""></xref> with the specified name or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a matching node is not found.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""> </xref> com o nome especificado ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não for encontrado um nó correspondente.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a node with the matching <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.LocalName*> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um nó com o <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the node to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O nome local do nó obter.

trans-unit.source: The namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the node to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes Uniform Resource identificador (URI) do nó obter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> with the matching local name and namespace URI or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a matching node was not found.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> com o nome local correspondente e o espaço de nomes URI ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não foi encontrado um nó correspondente.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the node at the specified index in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nó no índice especificado no <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the node to retrieve from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição de índice do nó para obter o <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index is zero-based; therefore, the index of the first node is 0 and the index of the last node is <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamedNodeMap.Count*> -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice é baseado em zero; Por conseguinte, o índice do primeiro nó for 0, não sendo o índice do último nó <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamedNodeMap.Count*>-1.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamedNodeMap.Count*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: If index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the property, is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se index é inferior a 0 ou maior que ou igual ao propriedade, é devolvido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the node from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove o nó do <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the node to remove.
trans-unit.target: O nome qualificado do nó para remover.

trans-unit.source: The name is matched against the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name*> property of the matching node.
trans-unit.target: O nome é comparado com o <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name*>propriedade do nó correspondente.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""></xref> removed from this <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a matching node was not found.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""> </xref> removido deste <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""> </xref> ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não foi encontrado um nó correspondente.

trans-unit.source: Removes a node with the matching <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.LocalName*> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI*>.
trans-unit.target: Remove um nó com o <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the node to remove.
trans-unit.target: O nome local do nó para remover.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the node to remove.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes URI do nó a remover.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> removed or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a matching node was not found.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> removido ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não foi encontrado um nó correspondente.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> using its <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name*> property.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> utilizando o respetivo <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name*>propriedade.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""></xref> to store in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""></xref> to store in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNamedNodeMap" name="XmlNamedNodeMap" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a node with that name is already present in the map, it is replaced by the new one.
trans-unit.target: Se um nó com este nome já se encontra presente no mapa, é substituído pela nova.

trans-unit.source: If the node replaces an existing node with the same name, the old node is returned; otherwise, is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o node substitui um nó existente com o mesmo nome, o nó antigo é devolvido; caso contrário, é devolvido.

trans-unit.source: The node was created from a different than the one that created the ; or the is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O node foi criada a partir de outro daquela que criou o ; ou o é só de leitura.
